title: [消息]1.9还有一个预发布版本1.9Pre6
author: rickky2

replies.txt_content: ................... 那这将成为一个beta的遗憾（bate？好像我打错了....）

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
a919298641 发表于 2011-11-8 22:06 
................... 那这将成为一个beta的遗憾（bate？好像我打错了....）
It's going straight from 1.8.1 beta to the official Minecraft 1.0 release at Minecon, these 1.9 pre releases are just leading up to the transition. 
有人也是说1.0会推出在1.8.1后，1.9只是过渡
我也是不认为1.9会有正式版
